name: Electrobun
title: electrobun.dev
shortDescription: Electrobun is designed for developers aiming to create cross-platform desktop applications efficiently. It leverages Typescript for both main and webview processes, utilizing bun for execution and zig for native bindings. This integration facilitates a seamless development experience, allowing coders to focus on functionality without worrying about language barriers. Ideal for projects requiring quick deployment and frequent updates, Electrobun ensures security, performance, and minimal bandwidth usage.
cons: Potential learning curve for new users
Dependency on specific technologies like bun and zig
